You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesW W] > &wfr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Wfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D51A.
  * `&wfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D534.
